title: Ep. 33 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description:
Get tickets to Tom Segura's Charity Zoom Event here: https://givebutter.com/lls-tom-segura

Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer start off this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave by to rebrand the infamous hashtag coined by Tom all those years ago. Tom suggests three new options to replace it. They also discuss Bert's most recent discovery: Nadav has red hair! Who knew? Tom shares a story of touring Dr. Dre's old house, which leads Bert to pitch a show in which they would tour celebrity houses and guess whose it is. They talk to Taran from Taran Tactical on the phone about gun laws in various states. The Bears also discuss Lance Armstrong, Bert's upcoming drive-in movie theater tour, and sign language interpreters.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
